function Design() { return(

design

client projects and personal work

2023
Flier for Alexis Pye's You Really Livin art show

Adobe Illustrator • This flier was a quick turnaround because I received valuable in-person feedback and my friend trusted my idea for this. The printed takeaway includes art writing from Veronica Carlton and further information for this show provided by Lawndale Art Center in Houston, Texas.

2023
Physical mock-ups for Frederico Heliodoro's The Weight of the News

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop • These mock-ups were for a Minaret Records release. As a music lover, a JAZZ lover, this is the type of work that I enjoy doing. It's even more rewarding to know that I'll be holding it in my hands once it's produced and manufactured.

2023
Flier for Gran Blooming radio show

Adobe Illustrator • Gran Blooming is a jazz radio show that I host at KTRU 96.1FM. Pretty straight-forward but I find that jazz album covers can feel the same way.

2022
Physical mock-ups for Brendan Eder Ensemble's Therapy

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop • These are the first mock-ups I've done for Minaret Records.

2022
Social media fliers for Beau yé Roc's in homage & sport beat show

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop • in homage & sport was a show I put together for MythoFutuRiddim, an annual showcase for artists and musicians. These fliers were made specifically for Instagram, Instagram Stories, and Facebook.

2022
Brand work for Keron Alleyne's campaign for New York State Assembly District 60

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop •

Link to palm card
Link to site

2019 - 2020
Ads for Beau yé Roc's world art pt. i album

Adobe After Effects

) } export default Design;
